synopsis.text: Albion's royal family narrowly escapes an assassination attempt, leading to an unprecedented crackdown on spies in the 19th-century London setting. The Commonwealth's covert operations group, Control, suspects a double agent within the royal family, heightening tensions. Amidst the turmoil, Control assigns their elite spy ring, Team White Pigeon, a daring mission: to extract a secondhand bookstore owner from an Imperial prison and deliver him to the Commonwealth. Ange, Dorothy, and Chise successfully execute the first part of their mission, but their challenges are far from over. To uncover the truth about the suspected double agent, codenamed Bishop, they must make contact and determine where their loyalties truly lie. With danger lurking around every corner, can Team White Pigeon navigate the treacherous world of espionage and unravel the mystery surrounding Bishop?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
